location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the back of the volume.

Foliation: the foliation system in use starts at the front cover and ends at the back cover and appears as a sequence of numbers written in pencil and enclosed in a circle, in the top right hand corner of each recto folio. The following foliation anomalies occur: folio 1 is followed by folios 1A to 1D; folio 26 is followed by 26A to 26I. A second (incomplete) foliation sequence also appears, starting on folio 2 and continuing to the end of the file notes (folio 160), also written in pencil in the top right hand corner of each recto folio, but not enclosed in a circle.

mods.abstract: Correspondence relating to the interpretation and application of various King's Regulations under Muscat Order in Council, August 1935 - February 1937; and papers relating to the preparation, drafting, publication and implementation of revised Muscat Order in Council(His Majesty's Stationery Office, 1939), July 1938 - December 1942.
